attributes.action: Full disclosure of the sinking of HMS Glorious, Acasta and Ardent
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the waving of the 100 Year Rule relating to classified documents of the circumstances and aftermath surrounding the sinking of HMS Glorious, Acasta and Ardent off Norway by the German battlecruisers Scharnhorst and Gneisenau on the 8th June 1940 resulting in the loss of over 1500 lives.
